note.query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1)>0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM [dm].[Fct_CRV_DailySales] WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE Datekey = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE()-1,112);
note.title: [Notification] CRV昨日销售数据未Ready
note.body: #### CRV 昨日销售数据尚未Ready！ 今天CRV报表刷新可能延迟，正在查看原因，请耐心等待片刻~ ![screenshot](https://www.paycom.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/FLSA-Delay.png)
